name: Audit & Metrics Hooks
description: Comprehensive logging and measurement of every assistant action for compliance and performance tracking.

prd.problemStatement: Understanding assistant performance, user adoption, and maintaining compliance requires detailed tracking of all assistant actions, recommendations, and user responses.
goals: Log every assistant action with full context
Enable performance optimization based on metrics
userStories: As an admin, I want all assistant actions logged so that I can audit the system
As a product manager, I want metrics on assistant performance so that I can optimize recommendations
As a superintendent, I want to see how often I accept recommendations so that I can understand my usage patterns
As a compliance officer, I want complete audit trails so that I can meet regulatory requirements
dependencies: Audit logging infrastructure must be implemented
All assistant features must emit standardized events
